body: You know sometimes, you want to do something, but you just cant think of something to do it creatively?... Its just weird having to just sit there and think of a topic to discuss on Avicus or any other forums... lol, This is why i want to make this tread, for people to suggest to other people what to write about (Maybe something REALLY long and you don't want to bother writing it). Although i want people to suggest something, i want to make it clear if you suggest something on here... Don't be surprised if it is gonna be taken :P. Again, just need some inspiration on what to do... Maybe a Series of some sort?... I do not know how this discussion is gonna turn out, but again, i made it for people to suggest topics, cause i cant really think of much lately. I am however wanting to write an "Anger management" discussion, because i need help on not raging much when i die XD. So suggest away! (I will be ok if this gets locked, I totally understand where this is spam <3)
